skills.name: Power Unleased (制限された力)
text: During battle, every time an enemy ship is sunk, increases damage of Algerie's next [Main Battery Salvo] by 50%, effect stacks until battle is over.

skills.name: Secondary Surprise (副砲の意外性)
text: Damage of the first [Secondary Battery Salvo] of the battle will be increased by 400%.

skills.name: Unquenchable Fury (拭いきれぬ念)
text: During battle, every time an enemy is hit by a friendly attack, reduce its damage by 5% for 10s, stacks up to 16 times.
